website_summaries.verdict: An affordable highlighter palette with a variety of shades that work well on a range of skin tones.
pros: Features six different shades for all skin tones, from pearl to gold to bronze
Creamy powder formula is easy to apply and stays on all day
Shades have shimmer but are not overly glittery
Can be used together or alone
cons: Ideal for makeup artists, but most people won't be able to utilize all six shades as highlights

customer_reviews.title: Item comes broken or you won’t receive it!!!!! 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this in store previously and it’s one of my favorite highlighter palettes! Although I’ve now wasted $40.00+ on TWO palettes!!! The first arrived completely broken into tiny pieces, and in good faith i decided to order again. YET to be disappointed once more! My item didn’t even arrive! I’m never buying a pallet like this from NYX online again!!! What a waste of my money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Starr

customer_reviews.title: Arrived ruined!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!! Arrived completely ruined! Watch about buying it online! I needed this I was out and it’s my absolute favorite highlighter but they’ve been sold out everywhere local and I thought I’d order it online but now I never will again! Only giving it one star because it’s my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: WHALEY 4 FARMS

customer_reviews.title: Ugh
customer_reviews.text: This product breaks from the compact every time I have purchased. I thought it was a defect but it happened again and went everywhere. Love the product itself but this issue sucks with wasting so much product due to it breaking and I do not travel with this product btw.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Came broken up
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome looks very nice, but when I received it, it was all broken up. So you guys should really work on packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice faint shimmer
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in stores. Love the color with the slight shimmer
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful colors. Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The colors are wonderful and stay on all day. However the palette arrived damaged but the customer service was outstanding, it was quickly replaced. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: How’s on nicely. Not too bright but perfect to e
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Simpher-Benwell

customer_reviews.title: Good for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I’m a red head and this color is great on me. It doesn’t wear extremely well but I don’t expect t many products to still look good after 12 hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: No One Else
customer_reviews.text: Love this product ... no one makes a palette with this much variety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonista

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, very finely milled product applies smooth and evenly and is blinding with proper application.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Laine

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect highlight pallet! Love! I am fair skinned and this is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Came all smashed. Not worth to by it here. Is like throwing money in the trashcan. Not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Not useable
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged couldn’t even use it. Messed up the brush in my order as well
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, greA for all seasons!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty bronzer that can be used in the summer and fall perfect color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Gives the ultimate glow. This is my favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Love this Glow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product compared to some of the other make up I have bought from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: It's too gold
customer_reviews.text: its too gold looking. Maybe better on dark skins tones.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle C Leddon

customer_reviews.title: Hard to blend it on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not my favorite but it still do the work. Not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia T

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 star because of the condition it arrived in.
customer_reviews.text: The highlighter is a beautiful shade, applies nicely, but arrived smashed.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. Great highlighter at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Highlighters are broken.
customer_reviews.text: I've got 2 highlighters broken and the lipstick purchased with them all in highlighters.
customer_reviews.author: Lilit

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Highlighter
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite highlighter and it’s a great price love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was all over the box, it was a mess and I’m very upset
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Damage product
customer_reviews.text: Dislike. I ordered this product and I got this damage.
customer_reviews.author: syed

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive golden shimmer highlighter/bronzer!
customer_reviews.text: Great pigment and shine. Has a golden tone to it rather than your usual white highlighter. However it is nice and blinding on the cheeks and has great color payout! Would also be great to use as a bronzer, but it does have a shimmer to it. Price was great as well at under $4!
customer_reviews.author: nebraska

customer_reviews.title: Most colors are not the best for deep skin tones
customer_reviews.text: The darkest color works well on my Mac NC 47 tone. The remaining colors look ashy on my skin. I do like the texture because it's finely milled and there are no glitter particles in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Born To Glow Highlighting Palette
product_meta.description: If you love highlighters more than you'd care to admit, our new Born to Glow Highlighting Palette is pretty much destined to be your jam. Packed with shimmery pearls that catch, reflect and refract the natural light, each creamy powder blends seamlessly into the skin and spotlights your features with an intense glow. It includes six silky shades which can be applied alone, or layered together for a multi-dimensional strobe effect.
feature_bullets: HIGHLIGHTER POWDER SINGLES: NYX Professional Makeup Born to Glow Highlighter Singles are packed with illuminating pearls to catch, reflect, and refract light for a far-out strobing effect. Apply to the high points of your face for a hot highlighted look

MULTIUSE HIGHLIGHTER PALETTE: Layer and blend these creamy pressed powders anywhere on the face as a highlighter, eyeshadow, or to add details and dimension to your makeup for glowy, totally lit up look

FACE FROM FOUNDATION TO FINISH: Complete your makeup look with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup face products to aid in color-correction & coverage from blush, bronzer, foundations & contouring concealer to palettes powders & setting sprays
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is certified & acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We don't test any of our products on animals

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all of our professional makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more
